headline: 2 Top Cybersecurity Stocks to Buy in June
summary: SentinelOne's valuation is quite cheap despite the company's strong growth.  Okta's offerings can provide a key part of a strong cybersecurity solution.  Most companies will find many other places to cut expenses before they trim their cybersecurity budgets.
